page.title: 15Events in the Felton Area
page.content: A church fete is held every year in Felton or Preston Wynne. The proceeds are divided between the two churches. Both churches have held a flower festival during the past two years. Bingo meetings are held regularly at Burley Gate Village Hall as money making functions. There is an annual clay-pigeon shoot to raise funds for the football club in Preston Wynne. Each year there is a horse event in which teams of horses compete over a cross country course built by North Hereford Hunt on the land of Court Farm, Preston Wynne.
